DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multi-center study evaluate effect quantitative HBsAg reduction peginterferon alfa-2a [ PEGASYS ] patient HBeAg positive chronic hepatitis B . Patients receive PEGASYS 180 mcg sc weekly . After 24 week treatment , rapid responder receive another 24 week treatment . After 24 week treatment , slow responder randomize another 24 72 week PEGASYS monotherapy , 72 week PEGASYS plus 36 week adefovir ( 10 mg , po daily , start week 29 PEGASYS treatment ) . The anticipated time study drug > 2 year .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Peginterferon Alfa-2a PEGASYS Patients With Chronic Hepatitis B Who Are HBeAg Positive
